{{note|This function is for [[SBARINFO]]. For drawing mugshots in [[ZScript]], see '''[[GetMugShot]]'''}}.
{{sbarinfo|<accuracy> [, flags, ...], <x>, <y>}} Draws a mug shot at the specified location. It will prefix the image to what is specified in {{Property|Player.Face}} and will automatically adjust itself to skins. Accuracy can be a number in the 1-9 range which specifies how many blood levels there are before death. Flags are: ;xdeathface:Will draw ***XDTH0-***XDTH5 when the player is gibed. ;animatedgodmode:***GOD1 and ***GOD2 will also be displayed while in god mode. ;disablegrin:Disables the grin state. ;disableouch:Disables the ouch state. ;disablepain:Disables the pain state. ;disablerampage:Disables the rampage state. '''custom''' :{{moreinfo}} {{Note|Early versions of this command had an additional {{c|default}} parameter at the beginning which gave the default prefix to use for the mugshot unless overridden by a skin. This parameter has been deprecated in favor of {{Property|Player.Face}}.}}
